New Records: The match broke the altitude record for an international fixture.
Key Match Events: Ramiro Vaca opened the scoring for Bolivia in the 13th minute with a long-range shot.
Carmelo Algarañaz doubled Bolivia's lead from the penalty spot before the break.
Miguel Terceros scored early in the second half.
Enzo Monteiro sealed the win with a goal in the 89th minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Bolivia's newly-appointed coach Oscar Villegas earned his first triumph.
The win moved Bolivia provisionally into the international playoffs spot in seventh place with six points, just one behind Brazil.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at the Municipal de El Alto stadium, which is 4,150 metres above sea level and 550 metres above the Hernando Siles stadium in La Paz.
Some 20,000 fans gathered at the stadium to watch the match.
